name: Christi Peterson
text:
I am the owner of Ray's Restaurant. I would like to say that our delivery driver, Jamie is the best! And for him I give him 5 stars. He always makes sure that we have what we need and goes above and beyond to make sure that we get it. Thanks Jamie!

The reason that I am giving Uni1st an overall 3  stars is because we often have problems withour towels being full of lint. They also come torn or very worn also. We sometimes do not get a full bag, shorting us before our next delivery.  Our aprons that we receive often have half of the tie torn off. So we can't even tie them on. Also, they come very stained occasionally as if they have been mildewed and then laundered. The mildew stain is still there after the wash. We pay a fee each week for these items to be replaced as needed, but we rarely see new items in the
mix. We have also had problems with the posting of payments in a timely manner. Because the payments are not posted we then get a late charge added to the bill. It would be great if these small issues could get taken care of.

name: Landrey Robertson
text: We’ve been a customer for a few months now, we had a mechanic lose everything he owned and uniform he had in a tornado on 3/25. I called Morgan on Friday 3/26 to let her know what happened. On Monday 4/5 an ENTIRE set of new uniforms were delivered. We cannot express our gratitude enough for these wonderful people.

name: Brandon Parsons
text: Great service, great people, always making sure things are done correctly. Strongly suggest any company looking for a uniform supplier to give them a shot. Or anyone who is not satisfied with their current provider. These guys are the best at what they do.

name: Lara Little
text: Love our UniFirst service here in Anniston!  Our route guy is Matt Hendrix and he always makes sure he takes care of our employees uniforms and our supply needs.  I've worked with other uniform services in the past and can honestly say UniFirst has been by far the best service I've encountered.  Highly recommend!

name: John Schafer
text: Great service. We swapped from another company who will remain nameless. Got way better prices and the customer service is by far better.

name: Heather Caldwell
text: We have been using UniFirst for almost 10 years. They have great service and if there is an issue they try to resolve it quickly. Chris our delivery guy is really good at his job and has a great attitude and is fun to talk to

name: Cindy Webster
text: We work in Tuscaloosa, and Chris is our "guy". He is amazing. I know he will be here every Tuesday morning bright and early, always with a smile on his face. Always speaks to everyone he encounters. If I have ever had a problem with our bill or just a question about the uniforms he his always there to help. I really dont think I have ever seen him in an ill mood. Great Job Chris!!!!!!!

name: Landrey Robertson
text: We have tried every uniform company available to us in our area, we switched to Unifirst several months ago and have been nothing less than pleased! The customer service is 10/5 stars. They even made my three year old son a custom uniform to match the "big guys" here at work. If you have a question or concern you get to talk to YOUR team of Unifirst Reps and they personally make sure you are taken care of and satisfied with their service.

name: Jennifer Kiel
text: I love my WonderWink scrubs!  Hygienically cleaned and very reasonable.

name: Ben S
text: Our uniform company is unifirst they are a great company and our route man is Chris he is great and always friendly and polite would recommend this company for all uniform needs

name: Leigh Anne Sullivan
text: Our rep, Chris, is AWESOME! Skyland Auto & Tire in Tuscaloosa, AL receives excellent service & professionalism!

name: Jeff Shackelford
text:
It’s a fabulous company and I highly Reccomend - Unifirst sets the standard for how uniform
Rental should be

text: Chris is always on time and does a great job taking care of us! Would always recommend!

text: Never get back a weeks worth of pants, sometimes I get 2 sometimes none and then the next I might get back 10

text: UniFirst does an amazing job.  Justin is our guy with UniFirst and he gives us the best, quick but efficient service EVER.  I speak for our company when I say, we couldn't ask for better.

name: David Mccormick
text: I have been using UniFirst  for 14 years. Scott Langston has always taken care of any issues as soon as they happen. Great customer Service.

name: Brian Richey
text: Have been using UniFirst for over 20 years and would recommend to any company looking for a uniform program to use UniFirst.  Great management.

name: Derek Vicker
text: Very happy with the service

name: David Savage
text: We have had flawless service from Scott Langston. Happy with the customer service he provides. Uniforms made easy !

name: Jerry Sherrell
text: Scott Langston is just like part of the family... He is very knowledgeable and good at what he does. We are glad to have him.

name: JD Humphries
text: great service and resolves issues in a timely fashion

name: Beverly VanOrden
text: Sent in weeks worth of uniforms and now my other week an my husband and son only have one a piece.. So not a happy camper right now having to wash every night one set an the every morning the other cause one works days and other works nights for same company..

resp.text: Our apologies and thanks for bringing this to our attention. UniFirst has built its positive reputation by delivering excellence in customer service, and it appears one of our Locations may have fallen short of our expectations. Please call our centralized customer service team at (800) 794-2706, so we can open an official Service Request. This closed-loop, computerized system features an automated tracking and resolution process, so issues never fall through the cracks. We record all concerns for follow up within 24 hours, assign clear accountability for actions, maintain a history of requests and actions taken, and close the request only after your satisfaction is confirmed. We appreciate your business and never take it for granted. Thanks for your patience while we work to fix this.

name: Eat Sleep Disc. Com
text: We get our Logo Polo Shirts & Hats from Unifirst.  Great quality & price.  Would definitely buy from them again!

name: Allyson Hann
text: I work for Icemakers, Inc.  Deal with Justin every Monday and he is a very top notch employee.  Unifirst always has great customer service and their products are very well taken care of.  If we ever have an issue it is handled promptly.

name: Connie Lawson
text: Derrick does an awesome job taking care of all our uniform needs. Very pleased with the service!

name: Diane Clark
text: Scott does an outstanding job handling our uniform needs.

name: Pam Bullock
text: Justin Sargent is our delivery person at Evoqua Water Technologies in Irondale AL. He is courteous, well mannered, and all around nice person. We have no complaints on the uniform service as of yet.

name: Steve Simmons
text:
I was not looking to change Uniform company's, when the President of our company asked me to review prices and services.
After meeting with Jady Hubbard and Jamie Pope from Unifirst, it was obvious I needed to make a change. I was able to save the company a considerable amount of money with increased services.
Jady Hubbard and Jamie Pope with Unifirst were always available with answers and made changing company's a smooth transition.

name: Steven Hughes
text: UniFirst has an amazing maintenance manager.

name: Rodney Dennis
text: Justin does a great at Clark memorials.

name: Joe Driver
text: I've been having a problem with my uniforms not fitting correctly ... All of them all the same size but do not all fit the same I've made one phone call and they came right out re-measured me and he getting me all new uniforms ... If you're looking for uniform company try try UniFirst before you spend time and money getting disappointed by the other companies

name: Derrick Marrisett
text: Great people Great place to work

name: Bob Akers
text: I have been using Worth Cleaners for several years and continue to be impressed with their quality, service and friendly staff. Usually visit them on a weekly basis to either drop off or pick up. Their email notifications are helpful also. During these unusual times the management and staff are doing everything they can to make sure everything runs as smoothly as possible.

name: JaKierra Lee
text: Awesome fast service

name: m stoup
text: Efficient! Friendly! Priced right!

name: Kimberly Lewis
text:
I went to this location on November 7th to see of they would clean an area rug. The lady that checked me in looked at the rug, consulted with another worker that was there at the time, gave me a ticket, and told me that the rug would be ready around the same time the following week. I called on November 14th to check the status of the rug. I was told "Yes, the rug is ready, but we couldn't clean it." I asked her why did anyone not call me to let me know that it could not be cleaned? Basically all I got was an "I don't know" and some other pathetic excuse. I immediately proceeded to pick up my uncleaned rug that has just been sitting on a table for an entire week.
For the entire life of me, I do not understand why something as simple as a phone call did not happen. As soon as they saw that they could not accommodate, all they had to do was call and say, "We apologize for the inconvenience, but we cannot clean your rug." I would have happily returned to pick up my rug and found another company to clean it. I am pretty sure that someone knew that Friday morning after I dropped off, that they would not be able to clean my rug. But NO, the rug just sat there until I called to check on it.  A simple phone call. Communication, communication, communication. Inconsideration and/or laziness. But regardless, there was absolutely no reason why I was not contacted. This was my first and most definitely my last visit.

name: Tony Drake
text: The folks at Worth Cleaners on Vaughn Road are like family.  They hustle to get me in and out as quickly as possible since I come in on my way to work. They are always pleasant and always happy to see me.  The clothes are always clean and starched just like I like them.  I couldn't ask for better service.

name: Kaleigh Flatt
text: By far the best dry cleaners in Montgomery! I have had items ruined at some of the other dry cleaners in town and charged an arm and a leg by the others. I like that Worth Cleaners posts their prices on their website so I know how much everything's going to cost before I go. Plus their staff is super friendly. I would definitely recommend Worth Cleaners.

name: Cecilia Ike
text: If you do not care about your clothes and want them ruined, you have come to the right place. I recently purchased 2 pretty gowns for my daughters, they wore it to one family occasion before we sent it to worth cleaners. They tore one and used their dryer to shrink the organza fabric overlay of the other one. They returned the clothes without mentioning anything about the damage(very fraudulent people) and when I asked them about it, they stated that they only followed the instructions on the care label, that I needed to go back to the store where I bought it (belk, 21 days ago) and complain to the manufacturer about the wrong care label. Seriously......for even the torn outfit? I don't understand why these scammers are still in business. I left the 2 gowns with them and they are yet to contact me 3 weeks later. There are so many credible laundry services out there, do not make my mistake!!

resp.text: Dizzy, we are very sorry to hear about your experience. We strive to give every customer that walks through the door the best possible cleaning service and we are sorry that you feel that wasn't the case. Please reach out if you would like to discuss this matter any further. Thank you, Worth Cleaners.

name: Kim Lewis
text: Good cleaners. Good customer service.

name: Darrell Moses
text: Ruined my shirt.  I sent it back several times ove4 a 2mos period and still no resolution.  Tried to contact the manager Steve Worth but he would never call me back. Staff kept acknowledging they gave him the message. Before this incident the Vaughn road staff was great.

name: Heather Stage
text: Kindest people, got me in even though I was late! Love them!

name: Just 1 Man
text: They did an excellent job on the band uniform

name: David Asuncion
text: Stains all over a brand new WHITE dress shirt, giant wrinkle in my brand new suit jacket. Steer clear of this place.

name: Andrew Watson
text: Overall pleasant experience. And they fit that stain out of my comforter.

name: Stephen Pierce

text: Always clean, never crowded but way too expensive imo.. and I always do laundry late at night so I have to travel to a different laundromat, which is fine and much cheaper. They close at 10 and  sketchy people hang out around there at night

text: No problem with the Washers but the Dryer's might be hot or warm regardless of the temperature setting.

name: John Till

name: Ghost Tracker Jenny
text: I go here about 2 times a week. If you go at night, it can seem a little spooky. But it is usually quiet and anyone that comes in is usually friendly or just keeps to themselves.

name: david calloway
text: Nice place just to expensive

name: Nickie DiMartino
text: Nice and clean overall. Large washer was a little more expensive than I thought it should be. Drier worked as expected. it's been a few years since I've had to use a laundromat but the price for everything except the large washer was good. Drier is 25¢ for 6 mins and 5.75 for the front load washer. Average dry is 7 quarters. I'm good with that.

name: Ashleigh Fulmer
text: Cleanest laundry mat I've ever been in. Have rest rooms, heat&air. Very nice place

name: Jeff Mann

text: Love this place.a safe place to wash clothes and all the machine work and dont cost alot to wash and dry.I wash one large load and one small load and it only cost me 12.0p. To wash and dry.

text: Laundry mat

name: Diana Courrech
text:
The name of this laundromat is the complete opposite of what it actually is.  There’s trash on the floor, the folding tables have trash and hair, the other tables with seating have some kind of gunk on them, and the change machine shorted me a quarter.  Also, there was no hand soap or toilet tissue in the restroom.  I think the person who works here noticed I was taking pictures because he started picking up trash from the floor. I have several photos to add in this post but for some reason I’m unable to upload load them all unfortunately.

The worst part of all the washers were filthy.   This is the most filthy and disgusting laundromat I have ever been to.  I will NOT be back!

name: Earl Lalik
text:
In town on business for a few weeks

Not so nice, and DEFINITELY NOT clean!

1/2 of the machines are out of order, and 1/2 of the others, steal your money because they are broken as well.

Definitely the Slums of laundry mat

Lost over $5.00 in quarters trying to find a machine that worked

At some point, I had lost enough money, it became personal, and I kept trying just do I could “hit the jackpot” and get my laundry done

AVOID THIS PLACE LIKE THE PLAGUE

name: Alisa Vernon
text: This place is horrible... The washers & dryers are always out of order.. the washers sometimes dont spin the water out of your clothes so u have to wash them ALL OVER AGAIN.. YOU WILL DEFINITELY SPEND WAY TOO MUCH IF U ARENT AWARE OF THESE THINGS.. JUST PLAIN HORRIBLE..

text: This place has gone downhill.  Someone has removed all the rolling baskets to move clothes from the washers to the dryers.  This is ridiculous.

text: I called the owner to tell them that the machines weren't working right, not spinning out patrons clothes, there was water all over the floor and how the dryers took my money. No one answered so I told them how it wasn't nice and clean and how disgusting the place is. Oh and did I mention that I found a meth pipe in the floor and basically it's a hangout for the homeless.

text: Just don't go here. 3/4 of machines not working. The dryer failed, one smelled like moldy fish.

name: Alexandria Haley
text: This laundry mat is filthy and it needs a person to watch over it 24 hrs a day or at least when it's open.People are constantly in and out of here so it makes me a little uncomfortable to be in this laundry mat at night alone.Security does patrol the area pretty often though.

text: The washing was fine, but none of the dryer get hot. Was there two hrs before I knew it and finally said bump it and I let them air dry

name: Eric Holderby
text: Dirty and half the dryers don't work.Find another place to do your laundry.

name: Black Henny Da Don

name: Jerome White

name: Bri Davis
text: My clothes did not get clean and it took forever for them to dry! I would only give half a star and that's because it was cheap! But you get what you pay for...

name: Melanie Ewing
text: If I could give 0 stars I would... I lost $8 bucks in these machines today.  About 25% of the machines work collectively, and that’s being generous.  I left a message at the number they advertise and no one has called me back.  I’m addition a man comes in smelling like a wine shack first saying he owned the place and then he told us (I was not the only one to inform him we lost money) he was just the clean up man.  He didn’t clean a thing but he did high tail it out of there.. my last time at this place, I doubt I get a call about my lost coins too

name: Syreeta Muwwakkil
text: They literally rob you if you swipe your card! I had to file a dispute with my bank in order to get my $12.50 back, yet the owner was in the store kept lying that he was a patron then tried to say it wasn’t on him that the machine glitches and kept charging my card. Refused to give my money back! Hot water wash is actually cold water, no toilet paper in the bathrooms. I wouldn’t even rate them 1 star but that’s the lowest offered!!!! 😡😡😡😡

name: KEITH Elledge
text: Charged me to much on my credit card.

name: Cary Gainey
text: Washer worked well. Dryer got clothes dry pretty fast. If you are scared of homeless people, don't come here.

name: Pamela Chears
text: Zero - You can tell this place hasn't been sanitized and disinfected.  Machines are all faulty and will give error codes so you will lose the money you put in.  From Chicago needed to assist a relative and the rates are extreme and dryers don't dry.Smh.

name: Michael Renew
text: It's convenient but continually have to keep a watch out for certain things that go on here.

name: Cortina Fletcher
text: They owe me money. There's no attendant ever. I feel like they don't show any concern bc of the location if that's the case then MOVE!!! You have ppl that doesn't have any other choice but to come HERE and there taking advantage and also they're money bc of that. THEY SUCK!!!!

name: Janet ROFFO
text: Have the dryer's don't work. Have the washers don't work.

name: Keitaris g
text: I will admit that the large washers to wash comforter sets are very good but to dry my clothes—that’s a whole different story! It took me several attempts to dry my clothes and I feel like it’s a rip off. They need to fix the dryers and have better maintenance of the washers, dryers and facility as a whole.

name: Phillip Pryor
text: I come here because I have to. The machines take debit cards. The machine clearly states 3.75 for a wash. My card was charged 12.50... The management is so worried about the homeless hanging around that it’s driving business down. So the owners are forced to steal from actual paying patrons.

name: Scott Anderson
text: Whoa. This place is a wreck. About half the washers don’t work, and the rest are pretty busted up. They leak soap from the trays, and water from somewhere. Dirty nasty place. Apparently no or very limited air conditioning. $2.75 a load for washing, but sometimes the machine doesn’t register the coins, so you will end up paying more. Go elsewhere.

text: I have had the worst experience with this dry cleaning company! I received a $25 gift certificate from this company for being new to the neighborhood. I came I with the gift certificate and was wanting to pay the difference. The lady looked at it and said the weren't able to take it because it's a comforter. I told her on it doesn't state what to dry clean and what not to dry clean. She said she was going to save it with the receipt and wait for the manager to get back so he would be able to take it off the ticket. I have been waiting for someone to call me for the past two weeks!!!! The owner mr.worth hasn't called me either. Not only will the take your gift certificate they will take your $300 comforter and won't return your phone calls! They present these gift certificates as false advertisement and I'm about to get in touch with the better business burial about the situation they are putting me in. I do not recommend using them!!!! Dropped off two leathers in January to be cleaned for $105 and after 2+ weeks later, I received both back DAMAGED, BURNED, SMELLY AND STAINED. In person, I was initially told I would be refunded by "check" from an employee who spoke to the owner by phone. After another visit, I was told the owner was still out and someone will give me a call. Since I never heard back nor received a refund, I disputed the charge with my bank. 3 months later, this business tells the bank that the clothes were inspected and there was no clause for the claim yet I am still waiting to hear back from the owner in regards to a refund by "check".

COMPLETELY UNACCEPTABLE
DO NOT BRING ANYTHING YOU LOVE HERE!

resp.text: Hi Ms. Webster. I am sorry to hear that you are dissatisfied with your leather items and we would love to help fix the situation. We outsource all leather cleaning and they pick up from us every other week. If you can bring them back asap we can send them out again to see if the company that handles our leather can remedy the items you have mentioned. If that isn't possible on their end we can take the steps needed after that. Thank you.

name: Lizbeth Skrobis
text:
Customer Service is not their specialty.

I dropped off clothes on Wednesday morning through the drive through window.  The lady said it would be done on Friday. I asked for delivery service so I had to go inside and fill out a form.  Then there John or Jason said it would not be ready until Friday, which was fine since I will be out of town but there will be someone at home.  On Thursday night I received an automated voicemail at 9PM; that they would be delivering and picking up clothes on Friday.  Friday comes and goes with no delivery so I called at about 3:00 trying to find out what the problem was.  I was informed by an employee named Katie, that my clothes was ready but there would be no further delivery because "everyone left for a family graduation" the graduation for the owners son.  She said that she would leave a note to see about delivering on Saturday, that, "it shouldn't be a problem".  On Saturday we called to find what time they would deliver and no one was ever informed and that they don't deliver on Saturday.  My husband had to go to pick up the clothes and was told there was a shirt not ready.  He was told that they would deliver the missing shirt on Monday.  On Monday we called about the shirt and was now told that they do not deliver to our location until Tuesday.  We got the shirt on Tuesday and John (or Jason) called my husband to say the shirt was delivered, trying to apologize.  Unfortunately I had to call him back because he told my husband things that were totally wrong.
The bottom line is that this business has a very long way to go to on customer service.  Family companies are great but there is no reason that one order should have so many untruths told in order to cover up for the fact that they left on Friday.  Additionally, all employees need to be able to talk to the companies policies, even if they are only part-time employees.  Because of these problems, we will definitely not be returning and everyone who asks (and some that don't) will hear about our experience.

resp.text:
Dear Mrs. Skrobis,
We apologize for the miscommunication on our side of the issue.  We tried to handle this as professionally as possible and we are sorry you weren't satisfied with our service.

Sincerely, Josh Watkins- Mgr

text: Pretty disappointed. Asked if they could remove 2 easy stains from 2 shirts, same day. They said no problem. Picked up shirts with the same 2 stains later that afternoon. Owner offered a "tiny discount" but otherwise didn't seem to care that the shirts were still in the same unwearable condition they were left in.

resp.text:
Mr. Reinaker,

I am so sorry that you weren't satisfied with our service!  We strive to treat every garment the best way possible but your shirts needed more time and it was explained when you dropped them off.  Since, your garments were dropped off at our cutoff time, 9:30am, and needed back three hours later by 12:30pm, they were not able to receive the attention needed to remove the stains you had in them. We pretreated your shirts for the stains but in order to meet your deadline needs it was not possible to achieve perfection. We would be happy to do them over for no charge at all but we would need the time to soak them since the stains are set in. Next time you are in a time crunch give us a heads up and we should be able to help you out or send to a respectable clothier to dress you with a few shirts.

Sincerely,
Josh Watkins
Owner
